name: As I Go And Find It
name_original: As I Go And Find It
description:
An ordinary day at the house of Paquita and Fernanda. The daughter losing the keys and other objects and Paquita looking for them throughout the house. However, Fernanda, tired of her mother's "As I go and find it", decides to step in and find her own things herself.

After this decision, begins a fierce race between them around the house in search of Fernanda's lost objects. Will Fernanda be able to defeat her mother's ability to find objects?

This game was developed by: 

  • Hector "Hecc" Marcos Rabadán: https://heccehrottor.itch.io/
  • José Luis "Tote" Gómez Antón: https://jlga10.itch.io
  • Javier Benítez Milán: https://orolobo.itch.io
  • Gonzalo Osende: https://itch.io/profile/gonose
  • Jose Antonio  "Vaent" Bernal Pérez: https://vaent.itch.io
  • David "Davre" Real Ortega: https://davre.itch.io
  • Alejandro Serrano Mejías
